main-text:
Order 6 new episodes + 10 new
battle zones for only 29.95 USD

✓50 tracks in all!!
✓6 new cups to race and 10
 new battle tracks.
✓play against human or computer
✓Choose easy-normal-hard game
✓8 characters with different
 playing capabilities.
✓multichannel digital sound
 and high quality music.
✓game speed adjustable.
✓Sound volume adjustable.
